long_description: You can stay connected no matter where your day takes you with the Analyst Tablet shoulder bag by Victorinox. This sleek bag is designed to hold an iPad(R) or Kindle. Interior organization includes a 10 in. portable electronic-device pocket and 2 mesh peripherals pockets. Front organizational pocket contains a deep zippered pocket, padded pocket, stretch-mesh pocket, secure flap-close pocket and a key fob. Exterior front zippered stash pocket. Victorinox Analyst Tablet shoulder bag includes an adjustable padded shoulder strap and a padded haul handle.
short_description: You can stay connected no matter where your day takes you with the Analyst Tablet shoulder bag by Victorinox. This sleek bag is designed to hold an iPad(R) or Kindle.
